form.label: THOR Add-Ons
form.description: Additional intelligence gathered during the THOR run

table.title: Outdated Systems
table.searchString: eventtype=thor_events NOT tag=false_positive "Outdated System - No hotfixes installed" | rex field=_raw "(?<outdated_system>[^\s]+) Warning:" | stats count by outdated_system,DATE | sort DATE

table.title: Rare Local User Accounts
table.searchString: eventtype=thor_events NOT tag=false_positive module=UserAccounts | rex field=_raw "(?<system>[^\s]+) Info:" | search system!=*DC* | dedup system,USER | stats values(system),count,values(LAST_LOGON) AS LAST_LOGON by USER | search count < 2
